overview:
Founder, Architect, Developer & Project Manager for a new Social Media Platform - Tech Start-Up VexPop www.vexpop.com to be launched Spring 2013.

Analytical and strategic thinker, adept at identifying emerging opportunities and capitalizing on new technologies and untapped markets to gain significant footprint.

Developed strategies and implementing solutions to deliver Real-Time Digital Media

Early adopter & Implementer of Value Added Services and Apps for Smartphones.

Consulted & Developed Delivery & Supporting successful Cross-Border Projects for Market Data Systems, EU Compliance & Regulatory projects.

Supports diversity of small businesses and helping them succeed with their IT Strategy and Websites.
